ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: If you had urges to self injure during the past WEEK, on average, how strong were you urges? Please circle the most appropriate number.
During the past WEEK, how many times did you experience urges to self injure? Please circle the most appropriate answer.
Notes: 0 = none; 1 = once; 2 - two or three times; 3 = several to many times; 4 = constant or near constant urges

ElementDescription: During the past WEEK, how many hours (add up hours) were you preoccupied with your urges to self injure? Please circle the most appropriate number.
Notes: 0 = none; 1 = 1 hr. or less; 2 = 1 to 4 hr.; 3 = 4 to 10 hr.; 4 = over 10 hr.

ElementDescription: During the past WEEK, how much were you able to control your urges? Please circle the most appropriate answer.
Notes: 0 = very much; 1 = much; 2 = moderate; 3 = minimal; 4 = no control

ElementDescription: During the past WEEK, how often did thoughts about injuring yourself come up? Please circle the most appropriate answer.
Notes: 0 = none; 1 = once; 2 = two to four times; 3 = several to man times; 4 = constantly or near constantly

ElementDescription: During the past WEEK, approximately how many hours (add up hours) did you spend thinking about hurting yourself? Please circle the most appropriate number.
Notes: 0 = none; 1 = 1 hr. or less; 2 = 1 to 4 hr.; 3 = 4 to 14 hr.; 4 = over 14 hr.

ElementDescription: During the past WEEK, how much were you able to control your thoughts of harming yourself? Please circle the most appropriate number.
Notes: 0 = very much; 1 = much; 2 = moderate; 3 = minimal; 4 = none

ElementDescription: During the past WEEK, on average, how much tension/frustration/anxiety did you have shortly before you self-injured? Please circle the most appropriate number.
Notes: 0 = none; 1 = minimal; 2 = moderate; 3 = much; 4 = very much

ElementDescription: During the past WEEK, on average, how much relief, excitement, or pleasure did you feel after you injured yourself? Please circle the appropriate number.
Notes: 0 = none; 1 = minimal; 2 = moderate; 3 = much; 4 = very much

ElementDescription: During the past WEEK, how much emotional distress (mental pain or anguish, shame, guilt, embarrassment_ has you self-injury caused you? Please circle the most appropriate number.
Notes: 0 = none; 1 = minimal; 2 = moderate; 3 = much; 4 = very much

ElementDescription: During the past WEEK, how much personal trouble (relationships, job, medical or health) has your self-=injury caused you? Please circle the most appropriate number.
Notes: 0 = none; 1 = minimal; 2 = moderate; 3 = much; 4 = very much
